name: Game & Watch: Mickey & Donald
description: You'l control both Mickey and Donald acting as firefighters, subduing a six story building fire. Mickey can go up and down to fix various leak in the hose, whilst Donald can be moved left and right to subdue the flames. All has to be done, while making sure Goofy doesn't fall asleep. When the flames are finally out, Minnie pops in to give Mickey some hugs and kisses. On the other hand, if the flames reach the top of the building then Donald's tail will burst into flame!
